scripts.local:version: lerna version --no-push --yes && git tag -d $(git describe --abbrev=0) && git push
scripts.ci:publish: lerna publish from-package --yes --no-push && git push --tags && git push
scripts.deploy: git checkout -b release_master && git push -u && git checkout master && git push --delete origin release_master
scripts.test-deploy: git checkout -b release_master && git push -u && git checkout master && git push --delete origin release_master
scripts.local:publish: git checkout -b release_$(date +%s) && git push -u && npm run local:version
scripts.test:publish: git checkout -b release_$(date +%s) && git push -u && npm run local:version
